eas_text: A civil authority has issued A LAW ENFORCEMENT WARNING for the following counties or areas: Coconino, AZ; at 09:48 PM ON JAN 17, 2026 Effective until 01:48 AM JAN 18, 2026. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: URGENT: There is a large Flagstaff Police presence near E. Kinsey Drive in Flagstaff.  Please avoid the area.  There is no danger to the surrounding area.
